short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a search feature to Woot.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Woot Search Extension enhances your shopping experience by adding a powerful and easy-to-use search bar to Woot.com. Search through the latest deals, products, and categories effortlessly. Stay up-to-date with frequent refreshed product data and enjoy faster browsing with optimized performance.
 - Quickly find the best deals on Woot.com.
 - Automatically updated product data ensures accuracy.
 - Lightweight and user-friendly interface.
Whether you're a frequent buyer or a casual shopper, this extension makes searching and shopping on Woot.com more efficient and enjoyable.
